      • extEuclid

        public static java.math.BigInteger[] extEuclid​(java.math.BigInteger a,
                                               java.math.BigInteger b)
        Extended euclidean algorithm Calulates gcd(a,b) and solves the aX + bY = gcd(a,b) equation for X and Y
        Parameters:

        b -
        Returns:
        Array of BigIntegers:{gcd(a,b),X,Y}

      • isPrime

        static boolean isPrime​(java.math.BigInteger num,
                       int trials)
        Test is num is a prime, using the Miller-Rabin test.
        Parameters:
        num - is the tested number
        trials - is the number of tests; the certainity level
        Returns:
        true, if num is probably a prime

      • millerRabin

        static boolean millerRabin​(java.math.BigInteger n,
                           int witness)
        The Miller-Rabin compositeness test
        Parameters:
        n - is the tested number
        witness - is the witness for the compositeness of n (can't be higher than n)
        Returns:
        true if n is surely a composite, else n is MAYBE prime
